content.value:
As a nonbinary person, I find the term “non-men” to be better for me than “women and nonbinary people.” I only use it when I can’t be more specific.

(This isn’t a monolithic statement for all nonbinary people.)
content.html: As a nonbinary person, I find the term “non-men” to be better for me than “women and nonbinary people.” I only use it when I can’t be more specific. (This isn’t a monolithic statement for all nonbinary people.)
